titleStmt.title: The passion sermon at Pauls-Crosse vpon Good-Friday last, Aprill 7. 1626. By Thomas Ailesbury.
titleStmt.author: Ailesbury, Thomas, fl. 1622-1659.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. M[iller] for Richard Moore, and are to be sold at his shop in Saint Dunstans Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
